title: Brought to Bay; or, Experiences of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: Like lightning a little fist flew through the air at his face,and then they were at it. Two boys were fighting on Waverley Bridge, heedless of slush and snow, punching each other'sheads, tugging, struggling, and wrestling. A morsel of a doglooked on, growling and showing its teeth, and never movingoff the wallet of papers.
